documents.name: Privacy statement
documents.text:
Privacy statement 10 November 2021

  1. General information
    This website (www.paulschroer.nl) can be used completely anonymously, is free of advertising and tracking and does not collect, use, or share any location data. Browsing this website does not require you to register for an account or provide any personal information to us.

  2. Purpose of Data processing
    We only process data to respond to your information request.

  3. Scope and duration of Data processing
    Information requests and all of the associated data will be permanently deleted after 6 months of inactivity.

  4. Amendment of the Privacy statement
    We reserve the right to change this Privacy statement from time to time in order to comply with changed legal requirements.

    This Privacy statement was last changed on 10 November 2021.
